newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico's 1,078-day UDI bonds real return 6.98 pct.
newsitem.headline: Mexico's 1,078-day UDI bonds real return 6.98 pct.

text.p: Mexico's 1,078-day UDI bonds were assigned at a real return of 6.98 percent at the primary auction on Tuesday.
Two weeks ago the 1,078-day UDI bonds had a real return of 7.03 percent.
Demand this week was 1.295 billion UDIs compared to 250 million UDIs on offer from Banco de Mexico with a bid-to-cover ratio of 5.18.
The 1,806-day UDI bonds were assigned with real return of 6.94 percent.
Two weeks ago the 1,806-day UDI bonds had a real return of 6.98.
Demand this week was 1.432 billion UDIs compared to 250 million UDIs on offer from Banco de Mexico with a bid-to-cover ratio of 5.73.
